from goes2go.data import goes_latest
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
G = goes_latest()
ax = plt.subplot(projection=G.rgb.crs)
ax.imshow(G.rgb.TrueColor(), **G.rgb.imshow_kwargs)
ax.coastlines()
